tours.title: Morning Desert Safari with Quad Bike
tours.description: Experience the thrill of a Morning Desert Safari in Dubai! Dive into an adrenaline-packed adventure with quad biking.
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable Morning Desert Safari in Dubai! Immerse yourself in excitement with heart-pounding quad biking, thrilling dune bashing, and the exhilaration of sandboarding. Travel in comfort and style as our expert safari guide picks you up and drops you off in a luxurious 4x4 vehicle. Capture stunning photos against the awe-inspiring desert landscape. Don't wait—secure your adventure today and make memories that will last a lifetime!
tours.title2: Morning Desert Safari with Quad Bike Dubai

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel or Residence Dubai
inclusions.vehicle: Pick up by: 4x4 Land Cruiser for the Adventurous safari & Camp
inclusions.tire_preparation: Convoy and deflate the tire pressure before embarking for dune bashing
inclusions.photo_stop: Dune Bashing and drive to reach the high Dune (with photo stop)
inclusions.dune_bashing: 45 Minutes Desert Dune Bashing at Dubai 2nd Biggest Desert Lahbab Desert (Known of it Red Dunes) by Professional Safari License Driver
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your hotel or Residence Dubai

tours.title: Desert Safari with Dune buggy ride
tours.description: Embark on the ultimate Morning Desert Safari adventure! Experience the thrill of quad biking across breathtaking dunes, enjoy a serene camel ride through stunning landscapes.
tours.description2: Set off on the ultimate Morning Desert Safari adventure! Feel the adrenaline as you ride a quad bike across the towering dunes, take a tranquil camel ride through picturesque landscapes, and experience the exhilaration of dune bashing in a 4x4 Land Cruiser or Nissan Patrol.With convenient pickup from your hotel or apartment, our expert safari guides ensure an unforgettable journey. Snap stunning photos of the desert's breathtaking beauty, glide down the dunes with exciting sandboarding, and stay refreshed with complimentary water bottles. Don't miss this chance to explore Dubai's magnificent deserts—book your adventure today!
tours.title2: Morning Desert Safari with Quad Bike and Camel Ride Dubai

inclusions.pickup_and_drop_off: Morning desert safari packages that include convenient pick-up and drop-off services from hotels in Dubai. This ensures hassle-free transportation to and from the desert.
inclusions.dune_bashing: The thrill of dune bashing is one of the highlights of a desert safari, in which skilled drivers maneuver 4x4 vehicles over sand dunes.
inclusions.sand_boarding: Morning desert safari packages include sand boarding, which involves sliding down sand dunes on specially designed boards, similar to snowboarding.
inclusions.professional_guide: An experienced guide often accompanies the safari to provide information about the desert environment, local customs, and answer participants' questions.
inclusions.duration: Morning desert safaris last for 3-4 hours, so participants can experience the beauty of the desert without taking up the entire day.
inclusions.desert_activities: You can include additional desert activities, such as camel ride, dune buggy rides, or falconry displays, to provide participants with a variety of experiences.
inclusions.quad_biking: Experience an adrenaline-fueled adventure on a quad bike as you zip across the sand dunes, exploring the vast expanse of the desert.
inclusions.camel_riding: Enjoy a scenic camel ride in the Lahbab Desert, perfect for capturing stunning photos and soaking in the tranquil beauty of the dunes.
inclusions.refreshments: Water bottles are typically provided to keep participants hydrated and energized during the safari.
inclusions.safety_equipment: Participants are usually provided with safety equipment such as seat belts in vehicles and helmets for certain activities such as quad biking and dune buggy rides.
inclusions.photography_opportunities: While on safari, tourists have ample opportunities to capture stunning photographs of the desert landscape, camel rides, and other activities.

tours.title: Morning Desert Safari with Dune buggy ride
tours.description: Embark on the ultimate Morning Desert Safari adventure with Dune buggy ride! Experience the thrill of quad biking across breathtaking dunes, enjoy a serene Dune buggy ride through stunning landscapes.
tours.description2: Embark on an exhilarating Morning Desert Safari in the UAE, featuring an adrenaline-pumping dune buggy ride across the mesmerizing desert landscape. Begin your adventure with a thrilling dune buggy ride, navigating the vast sand dunes and experiencing the unique desert terrain. After the ride, enjoy a serene camel ride, immersing yourself in the tranquil beauty of the desert. Capture the breathtaking sunrise over the dunes, creating memories to last a lifetime. This morning safari offers a perfect blend of adventure and relaxation, providing a comprehensive desert experience
tours.title2: Morning Desert Safari with Dune buggy ride

tours.title: Thrilling Red Dune Safari + Quad Bike
tours.description: Experience an unforgettable desert adventure with dune bashing, quad biking, and traditional Arabian entertainment in the stunning Lehbab Desert.
tours.description2: Embark on an exhilarating desert adventure in the Lehbab Desert! Experience heart-pounding dune bashing, thrilling quad bike rides, and immerse yourself in traditional Arabian culture. Enjoy a luxurious 4x4 SUV ride through camel farms, witness stunning desert landscapes, and indulge in authentic Arabian hospitality at our desert camp. Complete your experience with belly dance shows, tanura performances, and a delicious international buffet dinner under the stars.
tours.title2: Thrilling Red Dune Safari with Quad Bike Dubai

inclusions.pickup: Pick up from your Hotel or Residence in Dubai
inclusions.vehicle: Pick by: 4x4 SUV Land Cruisers for the Adventure Safari & Camp
inclusions.dune_bashing: Dune Bashing and drive to reach the high Dune (with photo stop)
inclusions.professional_driver: 45 Minutes Dune Bashing By Safari License Professional Driver
inclusions.red_dunes: Dune Bashing at Lehbab Desert (Known as Red Dunes)
inclusions.welcome: Traditional welcome at camp with Arabic Tea, Coffee
inclusions.food: Refreshment with Unlimited Water, Tea, Coffee & Soft Drinks
inclusions.dinner: International Buffet Dinner with Barbeque (Vegetarian & Non-vegetarian dishes)
inclusions.entertainment: Full Light and Sound display on stage and around the Camp
inclusions.belly_dance: Belly Dance Show on traditional Arabic music
inclusions.dropoff: Drop back to your Hotel or Residence in Dubai

tours.title: Evening Safari with Quad Bike
tours.description: Experience the magic of the desert at sunset with our Evening Safari package, featuring quad biking, dune bashing, and traditional Arabian entertainment.
tours.description2: Embark on an unforgettable evening desert adventure in the Lehbab Desert! Experience the breathtaking desert sunset while enjoying heart-pounding dune bashing and thrilling quad bike rides. Immerse yourself in traditional Arabian culture with authentic entertainment, delicious cuisine, and warm hospitality. Complete your experience with belly dance shows, tanura performances, and a sumptuous international buffet dinner under the stars.
tours.title2: Evening Desert Safari with Quad Bike Dubai

Our professional drivers ensure a safe and thrilling dune bashing experience in fully insured 4x4 vehicles.

additional_info.sharing_basis: This price is sharing basis price. We provide private vehicles as well.
additional_info.private_vehicle_price: Private vehicle price for up to 6 people is 900 AED
additional_info.passengers_per_car: There will be 6 People in one car.
additional_info.driver_license: All our drivers are having License from U.A.E govt. for Safari
additional_info.vehicle_insurance: All our vehicles are fully insured and as per security requirements of UAE laws.
